NSApplication
foom sensor app needs camera access to capture images and video for sensor data collection
foom sensor app requires microphone access for audio recording and when using the camera
foom sensor app requires access to the desktop folder to save screenshots
foom sensor app requires access to the documents folder to save data files
foom sensor app requires access to the downloads folder to save exported data
foom sensor app requires administration privileges for system-wide screen recording
foom sensor app requires location access for location-based data collection
foom sensor app requires location access while in use for location-based data collection
foom sensor app requires background location access for continuous data collection
foom sensor app requires calendar access to schedule events
foom sensor app requires contacts access to connect with people you know
foom sensor app requires reminders access to set reminders for important events
foom sensor app requires access to your photos to save and retrieve images
